html:
Ground like a frying pan
Air waiting still with no mercy
Sweat all around us
What a hot afternoon
I'll have one coffee more
Might get another chance
When clouds slowly
Float their way on the sky
And the sky remains blue
Like every single day
Not red nor yellow
Blue like my own eyes
One day Iâ€™ll find
A large cash box in a grave
And mister Angel Eyes
Will fall again
title: Angel Eyes
